descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3737/9157520607_ca5dc8dfcc_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=+1]
[center]A complete retexture of game\'s bones and skeletons.[/center]

[center][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7338/9166673649_aa0f4829b3_c.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7397/9166675475_1c25686c8b_c.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7328/9168890890_9edfdb08dd_c.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7363/9168898612_dd23c3b8ff_c.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2823/9166680005_1f56e1a4ea_c.jpg[/img][/center]

[center]If you don\'t like the blue effect on the skeleton eyes go [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37718]here[/url], and search in the optional files![/center]

[center][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3757/9184805255_58266d0768_m.jpg[/img][/center]


[u]Optional file[/u] - Bones

[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7450/9134151926_df4bfbfeaa_b.jpg[/img]

[img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3801/9134148942_1bed4d0ee3_b.jpg[/img]

[img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5533/9134142914_fee0281c4c_b.jpg[/img]

[img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3829/9134145842_790b78983b_b.jpg[/img]


[center][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3738/9208242082_b9fb3f44e6_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[center]You should download Brumbek\'s [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8655]SMIM[/url] mod to remove some texture seams issues. Just install my mod [u][color=RED]AFTER SMIM[/color][/u].

------------------------

Please leave a comment if you have any suggest, if you like or if you don\'t like something.[/center]

[center][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7319/9159422022_43eb8c16dd_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3717/9157668167_0a422c6403_o.jpg[/img] [img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7310/9159891948_0aa1293e66_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31731][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7316/9154439606_13892df1d4_n.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

[center][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7418/9161521174_bbda1e7b46_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30173][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3750/9162034418_de96ddaeb8.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

[center][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5538/9166837837_cfd3fbcf01_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37718][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7334/9162034988_42638232c4.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

[center][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5469/9168331409_5ac84abb6b_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32182][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5523/9169624372_cc462c502e.jpg[/img][/url][/center]


[center][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3676/9159613122_98a9535e37_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[center]Thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/283020]Brumbek[/url] for the original HD skeleton textures that I used for mine.[/center][/size]
author: Andre7890
